name: Chineoti Kheer Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chineoti Kheer Recipe: Milk 1 ½ kg Rice ½ cup soaked for 4 hours Khoya half cup Sugar 1 cup Green cardamom grinded ½ tsp Kewra water ½ tsp Almonds and pistachios slice 2 tbsp Silver waraq
instructions: Boil milk add in crushed rice, cup for 20 min till rice tender, add in khoya, sugar, keep staring. Cook till kheer thick. Mix well, lastly add cardamom and kewra remove in a serving dish sprinkle with almonds and pistachio and spread with waraq.
